title: Not in the Hour of Death
author: F. E. Belden

verses.text: But in death there is to remembrance of thee; in the grave who shall give thee thanks?â€”Ps. 6: 5. Come to him now, now while the heart is beating, Now in the morning, now when you feel so young; Not when the hour of time has hushed to stillness, Come in the noon-time, Come in the young and strong.
Not when the hour of time has hushed his gold-en cry; Come in the golden prim-i-ty of mind; Not when the mem-ory of summer is fast fading, Come in the sum-mer, Come in the song so young.

refrain.text: Come to him now, now, Come to him now, Jesus can save, O trust in his love, Jesus will save, O come to him now.
